      • setChartType

        public final void setChartType(ChartType chartType)
        Sets the chart type.
        Can be one of: ChartType.AREA, ChartType.LINE, ChartType.COMBO or ChartType.SCATTER.
        Parameters:
        chartType - the chart type to display

      • setChartView

        public final void setChartView(com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArrayString chartView)
        Sets a DataView initializer object, which acts as a filter over the underlying data. The chart wrapper must have underlying data from a DataTable or a data source to apply this view to. The first DataView in the array is applied to the underlying data to create a new data table, and the second DataView is applied to the data table resulting from application of the first DataView, and so on.
        Parameters:
        chartView - an array of DataView initializer objects, like that returned by dataview.toJSON()

      • setChartView

        public final void setChartView(String chartView)
        Sets a DataView initializer object, which acts as a filter over the underlying data. The chart wrapper must have underlying data from a DataTable or a data source to apply this view to.
        Parameters:
        chartView - a DataView initializer object, like that returned by dataview.toJSON()

      • setMinRangeSize

        public final void setMinRangeSize(double minRangeSize)
        The minimum selectable range size (range.end - range.start), specified in data value units. For a numeric axis, it is a number (not necessarily an integer). For a date, datetime or timeofday axis, it is an integer that specifies the difference in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        minRangeSize -

      • setMinRangeSize

        public final void setMinRangeSize(int minRangeSize)
        The minimum selectable range size (range.end - range.start), specified in data value units. For a numeric axis, it is a number (not necessarily an integer). For a date, datetime or timeofday axis, it is an integer that specifies the difference in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        minRangeSize -

      • setSnapToData

        public final void setSnapToData(boolean snapToData)
        If true, range thumbs are snapped to the nearest data points. In this case, the end points of the range returned by getState() are necessarily values in the data table.
        Parameters:
        snapToData -
